select t.ret_order_id, t.ret_order_code, t.order_id, t.seller_id, t.user_id, t.return_type, t.return_reason, t.evidence_pic_url, t.status, t.create_date, t.create_ip, t.logistics_code, t.logistics_comp_id, t.logistics_comp_name, t.audit_date, t.audit_by_name, t.reject_reason, t.remarks, t.confirm_date, t.refund_date, t.reject_date, t1.ret_order_item_id, t1.ret_order_id ret_order_id2, t1.prod_id, t1.seller_id seller_id2, t1.item_id, t1.sku_id, t1.return_number, t1.ret_fee from t_return_order t LEFT OUTER JOIN t_return_order_items t1 on t.ret_order_id = t1.ret_order_id where 1=1

update t_return_order
ret_order_code = #{retOrderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
seller_id = #{sellerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
return_type = #{returnType,jdbcType=CHAR},
return_reason = #{returnReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
evidence_pic_url = #{evidencePicUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

logistics_code = #{logisticsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
logistics_comp_id = #{logisticsCompId,jdbcType=TINYINT},
logistics_comp_name = #{logisticsCompName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

reject_date = #{rejectDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ret_order_id = #{retOrderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
